data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Botafogo's Bruno Nazario gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 1, It's a goal kick for the home team in Sao Paulo.
Corner awarded to Corinthians.
Corinthians awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 3, Can Botafogo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Corinthians's half?
Free kick in a good position for Botafogo!
Corinthians to take a throw-in in Botafogo territory.
In the minute 5, Throw-in Botafogo.
Rafael Traci awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Corinthians in the half of Botafogo.
In the minute 7, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Botafogo at Arena Corinthians.
Throw-in for Botafogo in the half of Corinthians.
In the minute 8, Rafael Traci awards Corinthians a goal kick.
Rafael Traci signals a Botafogo throw-in in Corinthians's half.
Ball safe as Corinthians is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 10, Botafogo's Marcelo Benevenuto has been booked in Sao Paulo.
Penalty! Rafael Traci points to the spot, great chance for Corinthians...
It's advantage Corinthians in Sao Paulo as Fagner scores from the spot to make it 1-0.
In the minute 13, Botafogo have been awarded a corner by Rafael Traci.
Botafogo have been awarded a corner by Rafael Traci.
Can Corinthians get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Botafogo's half?
In the minute 15, Botafogo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Botafogo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Corinthians's half?
Botafogo are coming forward and Keisuke Honda gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 15, Goal kick for Corinthians at Arena Corinthians.
Throw-in for Corinthians in their own half.
Ball safe as Botafogo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 17, Rafael Traci signals a free kick to Botafogo in their own half.
Free kick for Corinthians in their own half.
Salomon Kalou of Botafogo gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 18, Corinthians have a goal kick.
Rafael Traci signals a free kick to Corinthians in their own half.
Corner awarded to Corinthians.
In the minute 20, Victor Cantillo (Corinthians) gets a yellow card.
Corinthians to take a throw-in in Botafogo territory.
Free kick Botafogo.
In the minute 21, Botafogo are in shooting range from this free kick.
Goal! Botafogo go level at 1-1 through Bruno Nazario in Sao Paulo.
Rafael Traci signals a Botafogo throw-in in Corinthians's half.
In the minute 25, Bruno Nazario is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Ball goes out of play for a Botafogo goal kick.
Botafogo's Bruno Nazario looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 27, Throw-in for Corinthians in the half of Botafogo.
Botafogo awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 28, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Botafogo's Caio Alexandre misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Corinthians goal kick.
In the minute 31, Botafogo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Botafogo are pushing forward but Keisuke Honda's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 32, It's a goal kick for the home team in Sao Paulo.
Caio Alexandre returns to the field for Botafogo after picking up a slight injury.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Caio Alexandre for Botafogo who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 34, Corner awarded to Botafogo.
Botafogo have been awarded a corner by Rafael Traci.
Goal kick for Corinthians at Arena Corinthians.
In the minute 37, Corinthians have been awarded a corner by Rafael Traci.
Throw-in for Corinthians at Arena Corinthians.
Corner awarded to Botafogo.
In the minute 39, Rafael Traci awards Corinthians a goal kick.
Botafogo's Matheus Babi gets in a shot on goal at Arena Corinthians. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Angelo Araos (Corinthians) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 41, Caio Alexandre is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Caio Alexandre is back on his feet again.
Corinthians to take a throw-in in Botafogo territory.
In the minute 43, Rafael Traci signals a free kick to Corinthians.
Free kick for Botafogo in their own half.
Bruno Nazario for Botafogo drives towards goal at Arena Corinthians. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 45, 3 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Sao Paulo.
Throw-in high up the field for Botafogo in Sao Paulo.
Throw-in for Corinthians in their own half.
In the minute 45, In Sao Paulo Botafogo attack through Keisuke Honda. The finish is off target, however.
Corinthians have a goal kick.
The first-half has come to a close in Sao Paulo.
In the minute 46, Rafael Traci has blown to start the second-half.
In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 46, Corinthians awarded a free kick in their own half.
Romulo Otero is replacing Victor Cantillo for the home team.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sao Paulo.
Rafael Traci signals a Botafogo throw-in in Corinthians's half.
In the minute 48, Free kick Botafogo.
Corner awarded to Botafogo.
Salomon Kalou (Botafogo) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 49, Goal kick for Corinthians at Arena Corinthians.
Rafael Traci awards the home team a throw-in.
Angelo Araos for Corinthians gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 50, Rafael Traci awards Botafogo a goal kick.
Throw-in for Botafogo in the half of Corinthians.
Ball goes out of play for a Corinthians goal kick.
In the minute 53, Corinthians have been awarded a corner by Rafael Traci.
Botafogo have a goal kick.
Corinthians pushes forward through Romulo Otero, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 55, Free kick for Botafogo in their own half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Salomon Kalou.
Tiago Nunes is making the team's second substitution at Arena Corinthians with Mateus Vital replacing Angelo Araos.
In the minute 57, Salomon Kalou for Botafogo is back on the field again.
Corinthians's Mateus Vital gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Botafogo defender.
Corinthians have been awarded a corner by Rafael Traci.
In the minute 58, Rafael Traci signals a free kick to Botafogo in their own half.
Can Corinthians get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Botafogo's half?
Rafael Traci signals a Corinthians throw-in in Botafogo's half.
In the minute 61, Throw-in Botafogo.
Throw-in for Corinthians in the half of Botafogo.
Corinthians's Jo is whistled for offside at Arena Corinthians.
In the minute 63, Keisuke Honda of Botafogo gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Corinthians goal kick.
Jo (Corinthians) gets in a great strike – straight into the post! Ohhhh so close!
In the minute 64, Botafogo needs to be cautious. Corinthians have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick for Corinthians in the half of Botafogo.
Romulo Otero gets his shot on target but fails to score for Corinthians.
In the minute 66, Ball safe as Botafogo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Rafael Traci signals a free kick to Corinthians.
Corinthians's Romulo Otero misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 68, Goal kick for Botafogo at Arena Corinthians.
Corinthians awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Corinthians.
In the minute 70, Corinthians have been awarded a corner by Rafael Traci.
Can Corinthians get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Botafogo's half?
Attention is being given to Botafogo’s Bruno Nazario and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 71, Mateus Vital (Corinthians) has received a yellow card from Rafael Traci.
The home team replace Gustavo Silva with Leo Natel.
Bruno Nazario (Botafogo) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Rhuan.
In the minute 72, Rafael Traci awards Botafogo a goal kick.
Corinthians will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Botafogo.
Botafogo's Keisuke Honda breaks free at Arena Corinthians. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 73, Corinthians have a goal kick.
Botafogo take a 1-2 lead thanks to Salomon Kalou.
Rhuan instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 76, It's a goal kick for the home team in Sao Paulo.
Free kick for Botafogo in their own half.
In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 81, Botafogo make their second substitution with Matheus Nascimento replacing Matheus Babi.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Botafogo close to the penalty box.
In the minute 83, Goal kick for Corinthians at Arena Corinthians.
Corner awarded to Corinthians.
Corinthians have been awarded a corner by Rafael Traci.
In the minute 84, In Sao Paulo, Ramiro of Corinthians is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Danilo Avelar (Corinthians) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Botafogo defenders.
Rafael Traci signals a free kick to Botafogo in their own half.
In the minute 86, Botafogo are pushing forward but Salomon Kalou's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sao Paulo.
Mauro Boselli is on a sub for Ramiro for Corinthians.
In the minute 87, Corinthians are coming forward and Leo Natel gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Rafael Traci awards Botafogo a goal kick.
Free kick for Corinthians in their own half.
In the minute 88, Rafael Traci awards the away team a throw-in.
Rafael Traci will wait an extra 6 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Botafogo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Botafogo.
Corinthians awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Corinthians.
Corinthians have been awarded a corner by Rafael Traci.
Corner awarded to Corinthians.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-2.
Goal! Jo levels the match at 2-2.
That's a fine assist from Leo Natel.
Paulo Autuori (Botafogo) is making a third substitution, with Sousa replacing Caio Alexandre.
